content.rendered:
Our team surveys and investigates bulk, break bulk, palletised and containerised cargo in support of claims for damage and performs discharge surveys where disputes arise in relation to quality and quantity/shortage and contamination.

In situations where a voluntary sacrifice or jettison of all or part of a cargo has occurred we perform General Average surveys and we also providing expert advice on packing and packaging, loading / Load out, lifting, cribbing & sea fastening, voyage and discharge operations.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.
